q: Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.
h:
“Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.” —
Helen Keller

q: You are the only real obstacle in your path to a fulfilling life.
h:
“You are the only real obstacle in your path to a fulfilling life.” —
Les Brown

q: Everybody's life is either rewarding or an example.
h:
“Everybody's life is either rewarding or an example.” —
Tony Robbins

q: Don't live the same year 75 times and call it a life.
h:
“Don't live the same year 75 times and call it a life.” —
Robin Sharma

q: The quality of your commitments will determine the course of your life.
h:
“The quality of your commitments will determine the course of your life.” —
Ralph Marston

q: Life doesn't get easier or more forgiving, we get stronger and more resilient.
h:
“Life doesn't get easier or more forgiving, we get stronger and more resilient.” —
Steve Maraboli

q: A man sooner or later discovers that he is the master-gardener of his soul, the director of his life.
h:
“A man sooner or later discovers that he is the master-gardener of his soul, the director of his life.” —
James Allen

q: Life is from the inside out. When you shift on the inside, life shifts on the outside.
h:
“Life is from the inside out. When you shift on the inside, life shifts on the outside.” —
Kamal Ravikant

q: Here is the test to find whether your mission on earth is finished. If you're alive, it isn't.
h:
“Here is the test to find whether your mission on earth is finished. If you're alive, it isn't.” —
Richard Bach

q: Don't put off living to next week, next month, next year or next decade. The only time you're ever living is in this moment.
h:
“Don't put off living to next week, next month, next year or next decade. The only time you're ever living is in this moment.” —
Celestine Chua

q: Life needs to be more than just solving problems every day. You need to wake up and be excited about the future.
h:
“Life needs to be more than just solving problems every day. You need to wake up and be excited about the future.” —
Elon Musk

q: You can live a whole life time never being awake.
h:
“You can live a whole life time never being awake.” —
Dan Millman

q: Life begins where fear ends.
h:
“Life begins where fear ends.” —
Osho

q: Whatever you do in life, surround yourself with smart people who'll argue with you.
h:
“Whatever you do in life, surround yourself with smart people who'll argue with you.” —
John Wooden

q: Life has more imagination than we carry in our dreams.
h:
“Life has more imagination than we carry in our dreams.” —
Christopher Columbus

q: Would you rather live your life according to the approval of others or aligned with your truth and your dreams?
h:
“Would you rather live your life according to the approval of others or aligned with your truth and your dreams?” —
Robin Sharma

q: The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple.
h:
“The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple.” —
Alan Watts

q: You never know when a moment and a few sincere words can have an impact on a life.
h:
“You never know when a moment and a few sincere words can have an impact on a life. ” —
Zig Ziglar

q: No one can compete with you on being you. Most of life is a search for who and what needs you the most.
h:
“No one can compete with you on being you. Most of life is a search for who and what needs you the most.” —
Naval Ravikant

q: Greatness comes from living with purpose and passion.
h:
“Greatness comes from living with purpose and passion.” —
Ralph Marston

q: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
h:
“However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.” —
Stephen Hawking

q: Scared people want comfort and certainty so they avoid failure. People living fully seek challenges because this is where they feel alive.
h:
“Scared people want comfort and certainty so they avoid failure. People living fully seek challenges because this is where they feel alive.” —
Maxime Lagace

q: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering.
h:
“The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering. ” —
Bruce Lee

q: Even when you think you have your life all mapped out, things happen that shape your destiny in ways you might never have imagined.
h:
“Even when you think you have your life all mapped out, things happen that shape your destiny in ways you might never have imagined.” —
Deepak Chopra

q: Life is love and love is life.
h:
“Life is love and love is life.” —
Elvis Presley

q: Be as simple as you can be; you will be astonished to see how uncomplicated and happy your life can become.
h:
“Be as simple as you can be; you will be astonished to see how uncomplicated and happy your life can become.” —
Paramahansa Yogananda

q: The quality of your life is determined by the quality of your thoughts.
h:
“The quality of your life is determined by the quality of your thoughts.” —
Unknown

q: The purpose of life is the expansion of happiness.
h:
“The purpose of life is the expansion of happiness.” —
Deepak Chopra

q: I will not walk backward in life.
h:
“I will not walk backward in life.” —
J.R.R. Tolkien

q: Life is a balance of holding on and letting go.
h:
“Life is a balance of holding on and letting go.” —
Rumi

q: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
h:
“Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.” —
William James

q: You want to live but do you know how to live? You are scared of dying and tell me, is the kind of life you lead really any different from being dead?
h:
“You want to live but do you know how to live? You are scared of dying and tell me, is the kind of life you lead really any different from being dead?” —
Seneca

q: When it hurts - observe. Life is trying to teach you something.
h:
“When it hurts - observe. Life is trying to teach you something.” —
Anita Krizzan

q: Humor isn't for everyone. It's only for people who want to have fun, enjoy life, and feel alive.
h:
“Humor isn't for everyone. It's only for people who want to have fun, enjoy life, and feel alive.” —
Anne Wilson Schaef

q: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
h:
“Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.” —
Elbert Hubbard

q: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone elses. life.
h:
“Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone elses. life.” —
Steve Jobs

q: If you don't program yourself, life will program you.
h:
“If you don't program yourself, life will program you.” —
Les Brown

q: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone elses. life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking.
h:
“Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone elses. life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking.” —
Steve Jobs

q: Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge.
h:
“Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge.” —
Eckhart Tolle

q: To be fully alive is to feel that everything is possible.
h:
“To be fully alive is to feel that everything is possible.” —
Eric Hoffer

q: When you are tough on yourself, life is going to be infinitely easier on you.
h:
“When you are tough on yourself, life is going to be infinitely easier on you. ” —
Zig Ziglar

q: Never settle for the crumbs of life.
h:
“Never settle for the crumbs of life.” —
Og Mandino

q: Life happens in the river, not the shore.
h:
“Life happens in the river, not the shore.” —
Maxime Lagace

q: Why live an ordinary life, when you can live an extraordinary one.
h:
“Why live an ordinary life, when you can live an extraordinary one.” —
Tony Robbins

q: Focus on how far you have come in life rather than looking at the accomplishments of others.
h:
“Focus on how far you have come in life rather than looking at the accomplishments of others.” —
Lolly Daskal

q: We can choose to look at whatever we want.  We can look at what's wrong in our life or we can look at what's right.
h:
“We can choose to look at whatever we want. We can look at what's wrong in our life or we can look at what's right.” —
Sonia Ricotti

q: If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. if you are at peace, you are living in the present.
h:
“If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. if you are at peace, you are living in the present.” —
Lao Tzu

q: Be thankful for everything that happens in your life; it's all an experience.
h:
“Be thankful for everything that happens in your life; it's all an experience.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Cultivate the merry heart, develop the happiness habit, and life will become a continual feast.
h:
“Cultivate the merry heart, develop the happiness habit, and life will become a continual feast.” —
Norman Vincent Peale

q: Life is not just the passing of time. Life is the collection of experiences and their intensity.
h:
“Life is not just the passing of time. Life is the collection of experiences and their intensity.” —
Jim Rohn
